definition: the Americas/abbr. for 美洲[Mei3 zhou1]/USA/abbr. for 美國|美国[Mei3 guo2]
beautiful/very satisfactory/good/to beautify/to be pleased with oneself
dream/CL:場|场[chang2],個|个[ge4]/(bound form) to dream
to succeed/to finish/to complete/to accomplish/to become/to turn into/to be all right/OK!/one tenth

sentences.english: This is everyone's childhood dream in a game.
sentences.chinese: 这个游戏让我们童年的美梦成真了。

sentences.english: So clear and deep are my fancies, of things I wish were true.
sentences.chinese: 那如此清淅且深刻的迷恋，真希望能够美梦成真。

sentences.english: Tak your passion and mak it com tru.
sentences.chinese: 开释你的热情，让美梦成真。

sentences.english: But I kept writing, and, eventually, my writing dreams came true.
sentences.chinese: 但是我一直坚持创作，最后我的美梦成真了。

sentences.english: Tacopina's very excited. It's a dream come true.
sentences.chinese: 雅科皮纳非常兴奋，他美梦成真了。

sentences.english: To take a photograph of this type, really it's a dream come true for me.
sentences.chinese: 能拍到这样的照片，对我来说真的是美梦成真了。

sentences.english: May you live in interesting times, May you find what you are looking for.
sentences.chinese: 愿你生活的时代妙趣横生，愿你心中所想能美梦成真。

sentences.english: The Egg of the snowbird is a symbol of the artist's wish that your dreams may come true.
sentences.chinese: 雪鸟蛋是一种象征，预示着你将美梦成真。

definition: to have one's wishes come true/wish you the best!
dream/CL:場|场[chang2],個|个[ge4]/(bound form) to dream
to have all one's wishes (idiom)/best wishes/all the best/may all your hopes be fulfilled
bitterness finishes, sweetness begins (idiom); the hard times are over, the good times just beginning
see 有情人終成眷屬|有情人终成眷属[you3 qing2 ren2 zhong1 cheng2 juan4 shu3]

pinyin: you3 qing2 ren2 zhong1 cheng2 juan4 shu3

definition: joy from heaven (idiom); overjoyed at unexpected good news/unlooked-for happy event
